page.title: 20A CHILD'S DAY IN DONCASTER
page.content: I AWOKE AT HALF PAST SIX AND GOT UP AT HALF PAST SEVEN.I DRESSED.IN THE KITCHEN,DAD SERVED BREAKFAST.HE HAD MUESLI,MUM HAD TOAST AND I HAD BACON AND TOMATOES.I GOT WASHED BEFORE DAD USED THE BATHROOM. DAD DROPPED US OFF AT SCHOOL ON HIS WAY TO WORK.IN THE CLASS AT FIVE TO NINE OUR TEACHER TOLD US TO COPY DOWN A LIST OF FOODS.PLAYTIME LASTED FIFTEEN MINUTES.LUNCH WAS AT TWELVE.I HAD CHEESE AND TOMATO SANDWICHES.AT ONE FIFTEEN WE HAD GAMES WITH ANOTHER TEACHER AND THEN A STORY WITH A DIFFERENT TEACHER. WE GOT A LIFT HOME.AFTER TEA I PRACTICED THE PIANO AND WATCHED A COMEDY.BY THEN IT WAS TIME FOR BED. {PROJECT INFORMATION COLLECTED AND {PRESENTED BY TOWN FIELD FIRST, {HEXTHORPE MIDDLE AND INTAKE MIDDLE {SCHOOLS,PUPILS AND STAFF. }
